Articles.Content:
Longest distance with no boosters - Challenge

Description:

Let's defy the saying "Moar boosters!!!!".

You must make the biggest/longest distance rocket, and it must be able to lift off the ground with no boosters (Side-mounted).

Required mods:

FAR

Rules:

No engine or fuel tank mods, any mods that'll give you an advantage that most people don't have.

There is an exception for smaller mods like heat-shields for deadly re-entry.

At-least one picture of the craft at launch.

Submission

Craft name:

Craft link(Optional):

Images of craft w/ proof of longest distance (Screenshots of you flying it, or a screenshot of DV, etc.):

Other craft stats:

Winning

Winners are determined by vote or compliments in thread replies.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Craft name: Expedition-I

Craft link(Optional): N/A

Images of craft w/ proof of longest distance (Screenshots of you flying it, or a screenshot of DV, etc.):

Other craft stats:

This rocket can launch into orbit, go to duna and get in orbit, land on duna(kerbal is required to re-pack parachute), get back in orbit around duna, go back to kerbin and re-enter for landing.

Edited May 31, 2014 by Tortoise

Nothing is farther that infinite.

I can't remember the D/v since it's from .18.3 but to work it'd need about 9km/s.

EDIT: Don't got any of them launch pictures.

Edited May 31, 2014 by Spartwo

Nothing is farther that infinite.

http://www./convkey/1e47/bs7w414m4szxmasfg.jpg

I can't remember the D/v since it's from .18.3 but to work it'd need about 9km/s.

clever lol. But anyways I need atleast one image of it at launch please.

You must make the biggest/longest distance rocket, and it must be able to lift off the ground with no boosters.

What does a "booster" constitute in this context? Does this just mean no solid rocket boosters? No liquid? No asparagus? No side-decouplers? What are you talking about?

What does a "booster" constitute in this context? Does this just mean no solid rocket boosters? No liquid? No asparagus? No side-decouplers? What are you talking about?

This needs clarification since this two stage all stock design will go voyager or land most anywhere in the Jool system.
If it was no side decouplers, asparagus, onions, etc. that would make it a 'little' bit of a challenge.
What I meant is, no side-mounted boosters at all.

What I meant is, no side-mounted boosters at all.

I thought you just meant no SRBs.

You can go anywhere with a ship with no side boosters.

Apologies to the OP.

Does it need to be manned?

Maybe some sort of scoring system by stages etc?

Edited May 31, 2014 by SSSPutnik

You can go anywhere with a ship with no side boosters. Not much of a challenge sorry.

If you're not interested, then you didn't even have to comment
